Scripts.OnMouseDown: if (m_doptions.moveable == 0) then if (IsShiftKeyDown() and arg1 == "LeftButton") then m_DeBuffFrameCapsule:StartMoving(); elseif (IsShiftKeyDown() and arg1 == "RightButton") then if(m_options:IsVisible()) then m_options:Hide(); else m_options:Show(); end end else if (arg1 == "LeftButton") then m_DeBuffFrameCapsule:StartMoving(); elseif (IsShiftKeyDown() and arg1 == "RightButton") then if(m_options:IsVisible()) then m_options:Hide(); else m_options:Show(); end end end
